branchCategory.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Oversized Rod
branchCategory.description: <p>Series NCA1 medium duty tie rod cylinders are NFPA interchangeable, have a crimped piston rod assembly, are pre-lubricated and available in 12 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches. The oversized rod option is available on both the NCA1 standard rod type (-XB5), and the NCA1K non-rotating rod type (-X119US).</p>

breadCrumb.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Oversized Rod
